I'm starting to think that the Left might actually be right - Telegraph
 
 
 
 
 
 The rich run a global system that allows them to accumulate capital and pay the lowest possible price for labour. The freedom that results applies only to them. The many simply have to work harder, in conditions that grow ever more insecure, to enrich the few. Democratic politics, which purports to enrich the many, is actually in the pocket of those bankers, media barons and other moguls who run and own everything.
 
 
 Interesting article from a conservative, centre right newspaper.

 Ohhh - I think most, if not all, politicians are in the pocket of the haves...

Do you think perhaps having Fox News, Linmbaugh, Beck, Hannity, O'Rielly and Coulter to name a few might have something to do with the problem. Not to mention the so called conservative think tanks like, Heritage Foundation, The Cato Institute, Citizens Against Government Waste, Media Research Center, Townhall. The liberals can have answers to the test and still manage to fail it. As Mark Twain said, "I don't belong to any organized party, I'm a democrat."
